sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { GetTicketByName } from "./api"; function Usertickets(props) { let [userData, setuserData] = useState([]) useEffect(async () => { let users = await GetTicketByName(props.match.params.id); setuserData(...userData, users.data) console.log("Mounted") }, []) return ( <>
{ userData.map((user) => { return (
Tiket Details
{user.moviename}
name: {user.username}
Time: {user.time}
Date: {user.date}
Seats Booked: {user.totalseats}
Theater: {user.theater}
Place: {user.place}
Total Amount: {user.total}
) }) }
) } export default Usertickets;
